title: 2 Bed Azul Lakeshore Apartments on Lady Bird Lake off Lakeshore Blvd
map_address: 1705 S lakeshore Blvd near Waterloo Ln
posting_body: I'm a Realtor specializing in rental and apartment locating in and around the Austin area.
Please call or email me if you would like to talk about when you need to move, what you are looking for, schedule a showing, and look at some of these apartment listings.
You can see all the Austin area rental listings including condos, homes, townhomes, apartments and duplexes on our website:
east north south west northwest northeast southwest southeast apartment apartments rent rental UT campus #prideoftexas condo condos townhouse townhouses house houses home homes duplex duplexes
